1370: Herman was born in Die Coninc straet in 1370.
Got married to Waldrada at age 26 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Waldrada, Berta, at age 26.
1390: Had a son with Waldrada, Wilbord, at age 46.
1371: Had a daughter with Waldrada, bertrade, at age 27.
1374: Had a daughter with Waldrada, Suaneka, at age 30.
1376: Had a daughter with Waldrada, Lutghardis, at age 32.
1378: Had a daughter with Waldrada, Gheesen, at age 34.
Lost daughter Gheesen when Gheesen was 1 years old.
1382: Had a son with Waldrada, Conrado, at age 38.
1383: Lost daughter Berta when Berta was 14 years old.
1385: Had a son with Waldrada, Ricward, at age 41.
